animeTitle: Falling For My Former Wife Season 1
otherNames: 复婚之战：总裁追妻路漫漫
synopsis: Two people are the victims of a business marriage. In the face of small three provocation, the special care of the good friend brother, Lu Nanyin will be a battle of wits and courage, but also play good "Gu Gu wife". And Gu Xiaocheng was forced to marry Lu Nanyin, full of resentment deep among them, even irredeemable fell in love with her...
